author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Hudson's Bay Appoints Vanessa Lefebvre President Of Lord & Taylor
text:
May 14 (Reuters) - Hudson’s Bay Co:
* HBC APPOINTS VANESSA LEFEBVRE PRESIDENT OF LORD & TAYLOR Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
